snippet: At this cocktail bar in Greenwich Village, a California-style burger makes everything seem O.K.
abstract: Jeff Gordinier reviews The Happiest Hour, Greenwich Village cocktail bar that offers California-style burger called happiest Burger.
lead_paragraph: At this cocktail bar in Greenwich Village, a California-style burger makes everything seem O.K.

headline.print_headline: A Showstopping Cheeseburger Does a Star Turn
headline.main: At the Happiest Hour, a Cheeseburger Does a Star Turn
